title: Ali Baba Dadao Qibing
synopsis: In the middle of the 15th century, the richest adventure kingdom on the Central Continent circulated a legend about the king's heart-as long as you find the king's heart, you can become a king. Princess Margina has never had a real adventure because of her cowardly nature. Everyone in the adventure kingdom knows her as the "coward princess". She has been working hard to inherit the throne, but she was questioned at the ball where the king announced her successor. She wanted to become the king and decided to prove herself. She escaped from the ball and became a partner with the slum boy Ali Baba. Together with Alibaba, his "Treasure Hunting Guide" entered the mysterious and exciting world of treasure trove and embarked on a journey to find the heart of the king. Entering the treasury with them is a trio of robbers who do no evil. They conquered the mirror monsters and formed a powerful gang of forty thieves. The robber boss wants to get the king's heart to establish a robber kingdom, and the unpredictable danger will face the princess and Ali. Baba approached step by step. 　　 In the end, the princess and her team passed the dangers of the treasure house, and Alibaba realized his wish to defeat the robbers. The princess got the heart of the king, and also understood the abilities most needed to become a king, and grew up in the adventure. (translated from douban)
